mapper.update: UPDATE mall_goods SET status=#{status},update_time=NOW() WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
mapper.select: SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, brand brand, cate cate, price price, original original, tags tags, content content, summary summary, status status, goods_main_image goodsMainImage, goods_sub_images goodsSubImages, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, user_id userId FROM mall_goods

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, brand brand, cate cate, price price, original original, tags tags, content content, summary summary, status status, goods_main_image goodsMainImage, goods_sub_images goodsSubImages, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, user_id userId FROM mall_goods WHERE user_id=#{userId} and status = #{status}

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, brand brand, cate cate, price price, original original, tags tags, content content, summary summary, status status, goods_main_image goodsMainImage, goods_sub_images goodsSubImages, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, user_id userId FROM mall_goods WHERE goods_name like CONCAT('%',#{goodsName},'%')

SELECT goods_id goodsId, goods_name goodsName, brand brand, cate cate, price price, original original, tags tags, content content, summary summary, status status, goods_main_image goodsMainImage, goods_sub_images goodsSubImages, create_time createTime, update_time updateTime, user_id userId FROM mall_goods WHERE goods_id=#{goodsId}
